windowId.description: ID of the window, where the notification should be added to.

icon.description: Path to an icon to appear on the notification, path must be relative to the extensions root folder. Default is an appropriate icon for the priority level is used.

priority.description: Priority of the notification. Priorities ranges from PRIORITY_INFO_LOW to PRIORITY_CRITICAL_HIGH. Default is PRIORITY_INFO_LOW.

style.description: Additional CSS styles to apply to the notification. Supported CSS properties are 'color', 'background*', 'margin*', 'padding*' and 'font*'

id.desciption: The id of the button, which is sent to onButtonClicked events.

label.desciption: The label to appear on the button.

accesskey.desciption: The accesskey attribute set on the button.

parameters.name: notificationId
parameters.description: The ID of the notification to be removed.

events.name: onButtonClicked
events.description: Fired when the user clicks on a button in a notification.

parameters.name: windowId
parameters.description: The ID of the window containing the notification of the clicked button.

parameters.name: notificationId
parameters.description: The ID of the notification of the clicked button.

parameters.name: buttonId
parameters.description: The ID of the button clicked by the user.

events.name: onDismissed
events.description: Fired when a notification has been dismissed by the user.

parameters.name: windowId
parameters.description: The ID of the window containing the dismissed notification.

parameters.name: notificationId
parameters.description: The ID of the dismissed notification.

events.name: onClosed
events.description: Fired when a notification has been closed (button, dismiss, or manually calling clear()).

parameters.name: windowId
parameters.description: The ID of the window containing the closed notification.

parameters.name: notificationId
parameters.description: The ID of the closed notification.

parameters.name: byUser
parameters.description: The notification was closed by the user.
